movies.title: Corto Maltese - Sous le signe du capricorne
movies.plot: In 1916, laconic adventurer Corto Maltese is taking a siesta in Paramaribo, the capital of Dutch colony of Suriname. He's also seeing some old friends there. Golden Mouth, a legendary local friendly mystical 200-year-old voodoo medium who looks like a beautiful young woman asks him to help Tristan, a young confused teenage gentleman who's been led to her by voodoo spirits who's been haunting him ever since he inherited the controlling interest in his father's company. The other big shareholder, a sleazy lawyer, wants the company for himself, even if he has to kill Tristan to get it, and the spirits can't let that happen for reasons of their own. Professor Jeremiah Steiner, once brilliant scholar and now a local drunk has-been who Corto saves from local thugs, befriends Corto and offers his help in deciphering a mysterious map left to Tristan by his secretive father that mentions the Aztec gods, a gate and the fictional lost continent of Mu. Golden Mouth also hires Corto to take a ...
movies.simplePlot: In 1916, laconic adventurer Corto Maltese is in Paramaribo, Surinam visiting his mystic female friend Java. He helps a young heir haunted by voodoo spirits, delivers some weapons to rebels in Brazil and hunts for treasure with Rasputin.

biography.bio: Richard Berry was born on July 31, 1950 in Paris, France as Richard Élie Benguigui. He is an actor and writer, known for L'immortel (2010), Ruby & Quentin (2003) and The Valet (2006). He has been married to Pascale Louange since September 17, 2016. They have one child. He was previously married to Jessica Forde and Jeane Manson.
biography.name: Richard Berry

biography.bio: Patrick Bouchitey was born on August 11, 1946 in Plancher-les-Mines, Haute-Saône, France. He is an actor and writer, known for La meilleure façon de marcher (1976), Lune froide (1991) and La tête en friche (2010).
biography.name: Patrick Bouchitey

biography.bio: Catherine Jacob was born on December 16, 1956 in Paris, France. She is an actress and writer, known for Tatie Danielle (1990), Livide (2011) and Mon Pere Ce Heros (1991).
biography.name: Catherine Jacob

biography.bio: Marie Trintignant died tragically on the 1st of August, 2003 from a cerebral edema in Neuilly-sur-Seine near Paris, France, following a violent fight with her boyfriend, Bertrand Cantat, lead singer in the French rock band, Noir Désir. She was just finishing filming a TV movie about Colette, directed by her mother. Born into show business, she made her first screen appearance when she was just four-years-old but her breakthrough came in 1979 with the film "Série noire". In 1990, she had her first leading role in "Une nuit d'été en ville". Her second major role came in 1992 as "Betty", a bourgeois alcoholic. She also did theater work, notably "Le Retour", by Harold Pinter. Her last film, Janis et John (2003), was completed three months before her death.
biography.name: Marie Trintignant

biography.bio: Marc Andréoni was born on February 8, 1961 in France. He is an actor and writer, known for Léon: The Professional (1994), 3 Days to Kill (2014) and District B13 (2004).
biography.name: Marc Andréoni

biography.bio: Claude Beyney is an actor, known for Corto Maltese - Sous le signe du capricorne (2002).
biography.name: Claude Beyney

biography.bio: Marie-Noëlle Eusèbe is an actress, known for Madeline (1998), La méthode rose (1986) and Cantara (1990).
biography.name: Marie-Noëlle Eusèbe

biography.bio: Jean-Pierre Lazzeri is an actor, known for Corto Maltese - Sous le signe du capricorne (2002).
biography.name: Jean-Pierre Lazzeri

biography.bio: Francis Leplay was born on July 25, 1967 in Saint-Mandé, Seine [now Val-de-Marne], France. He is an actor, known for Marie Antoinette (2006), Les cowboys (2015) and 3 Hearts (2014).
biography.name: Francis Leplay

biography.bio: Maxime Leroux was born on March 26, 1951 in Sainte-Adresse, Seine-Inférieure [now Seine-Maritime], France as Maxime Noël Michel Leroux. He was an actor, known for Camille Claudel (1988), Colonel Chabert (1994) and Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989). He died on January 24, 2010 in Rouen, Seine-Maritime, Haute-Normandie, France.
biography.name: Maxime Leroux

biography.bio: François Levantal was born on October 10, 1960 in Paris, France. He is an actor, known for The Crimson Rivers (2000), La Haine (1995) and A Very Long Engagement (2004).
biography.name: François Levantal

biography.bio: Nadja Nguyen is an actress, known for Série noire (1984) and Commissaire Moulin (1976).
biography.name: Nadja Nguyen

biography.bio: François Soule is an actor, known for Fanfan (2003), Trafic d'influence (1999) and Three Lives and Only One Death (1996).
biography.name: François Soule

biography.bio: Damien Witecka was born on April 10, 1968 in Dijon, Côte-d'Or, France. He is an actor, known for Corto Maltese - La ballade de la mer salée (2002), Corto Maltese - Sous le signe du capricorne (2002) and Cap Nord (2007).
biography.name: Damien Witecka
